channel.title: Client error - uknown host
channel.description: Hi Guys i can get access locally and i have setup port forwarding at home and no-ip on desktop to my ip, now i've put my home ip address in as the "string IP" and recompiled but when i try and launch it says invalid host, is this becuase i ahve to play locally and can only access via my ip from another WAN IP? any advice would be greatly appreciated.

item.title: Client error - uknown host
item.dc:creator: @rowls93 rowls93
item.description:
@rowls93 wrote:

Hi Guys i can get access locally and i have setup port forwarding at home and no-ip on desktop to my ip, now i’ve put my home ip address in as the “string IP” and recompiled but when i try and launch it says invalid host, is this becuase i ahve to play locally and can only access via my ip from another WAN IP? any advice would be greatly appreciated.
